items.question: Do I need prior coding experience?
items.answer: No, our platform is suitable for beginners and experienced developers alike.

items.question: Can I use the IDE directly in my browser?
items.answer: Yes, the IDE is fully integrated and runs entirely in your browser.

items.question: Are the courses interactive?
items.answer: Absolutely! All courses have interactive exercises and real projects.

items.question: Is this platform free?
items.answer: We offer both free and premium courses for learners of all levels.
